description:
For the first time in years, Shinji meets his father at his mother`s grave. Ritsuko, Misato and Ryoji attend a wedding and Asuka goes on a date.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Kłamstwo i cisza / Te kobiety marzyły o dotyku obcych warg i to przyciągało ich pocałunki
Those Women Longed for the Touch of Others` Lips, and Thus Invited Their Kisses.
